tool_description: API to scrape Google trends data in unlimited volumes with robustness and  consistency.
name: Trendly
title: Trendly

api_list.name: Geographic options
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trendly.p.rapidapi.com/geo"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trendly.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
